description: Upward Mobility's CLEP Social Sciences and History Exam Prep app for Palm webOS provides 150 simulated exam questions with detailed answers.  Each question is followed by a clear and insightful explanation paired with a Key Takeaway that summarizes the key learning point of the question, ensuring comprehensive understanding of the material.   *  This module addresses nearly all the topics commonly covered on the exam, including United States History, Western Civilization, World History, Government/Political Science, Geography, Psychology, Sociology, Economics, and Anthropology  *  This exam is also effective review for an introductory level Social Sciences class at the college level, or as a course-in-an-app for someone who wishes to learn the material on their own. ||  The College-Level Examination Program (CLEP) allows you to earn credit for knowledge that you have gained through your own study, prior course work, career, professional development, cultural pursuits, or internships.  * Disclaimer: The College-Level Examination Program® (CLEP) and CLEP are trademarks of College Board which had no role in the creation of this product and does not endorse it.   ||   Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  We hire only expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and put all of our materials through a thorough review process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
